amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 110-407 to provide that any employer found, based on a determination by the Department of Homeland Security or the Attorney General to have engaged in a pattern or practice of hiring, recruiting or referring for a fee, for employment in the United States an alien knowing the person is an unauthorized alien shall be subject to debarment from the receipt of future Federal contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gillibrand amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
